name: Time Dungeon (JuDelCo)
description:
Time Dungeon is a game about the legend of a valiant knight and an archaeologist who discovers the truth behind his demise.

By collaborating through time, the old hero and the scientist are able to explore the ancient temple where the knight died, and save his life!

  • Archaeologist: A-D to move, W to jump, Q to shoot. As this player, you can send boxes through time to help the knight.
  • Knight: Right and left arrow to move, up arrow to jump.

As the knight, you can move heavy objects like boxes, and influence the future!

GGJ Page: http://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/time-dungeon
